info.title: SDB API
info.description: Access proteins and families coevolutionary data with the SDB API

get.summary: SDB data for a protein family
get.description: This endpoint takes a Pfam ID or accession as input and return all the general information and SDB data for the selected family.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A Pfam ID or accession. Example: PF00062 or Lys.

get.summary: SDB data for a protein sequence
get.description: This endpoint takes a UniProtKb ID or accession as input and return all the general information and SDB data for the selected protein.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UniProtKb ID or accession. Example: LYSC_CHICK or P00698.
